name: Elated Sorrow
description:
Max is lonely and unhappy with her life. That all changes when she goes for a walk in the forest and has a chance meeting with a woman named Lyra. Since that day she hasn't been able to stop thinking about her.

Elated Sorrow is a yuri, slice of life romance story. It is a kinetic novel which means there are no choices. 

Features:

12,000+ words 

2 CGs (by the lovely squidcolas.)

A cute wlw love story. 

Trigger warning: Mental health issues such as depression and suicidal thoughts. Mild cursing. Brief mentions of parental abuse and neglect. (There is a spider in the story, but you never see it.)
